phrases: Do not cry over a skinned knee!
You are a man, are not you?
It is your fault for making me do the...
But thank goodness you only hurt your leg.
If I would gotten your hands hurt, I would have gotten killed by your mom.
A towel and a change of clothes.
I will put your uniform in the dryer.
My dad's away on business a lot.
Hey, it is bigger than I thought.
I can make you some hot milk, too...
Wholesome playing starts with a wholesome environment!
Hey, you are next door, Tsubaki-chan!
It is not what it looks like!
There is a good reason for this!
She sure is fired up, that Tsubaki.
Is not she just on a rampage?
I guess false cheer is better than none at all.
What you just played - on tape!
Your set piece is Chopin's Etude Op. 25 No. 5.
The tempo and sound are so out of sync!
That is right, if I act now I can still...
I have already sent in your submission.
So what kind of competition is this?
It is the Maihou Music Competition.
A national-level contest that is spawned many a renowned musician.
If you win Nationals, you might even get the chance to perform overseas!
What Kao-chan's saying sounds like something from a faraway, different world...
I have got to study under some teacher!
You are going to prove that you can play even if you cannot hear the notes!
It takes courage to sail in uncharted waters!
The important thing is your imagery.
Before your fingers touch the keys,
you must determine in your mind how you are going to play it.
Why do you play the piano?
Is it for your own sake?
How do you want to play this piece?
How does the real you want to play Chopin?
So anyway, I am counting on you.
You two take it from here!
I am going to work hard!
Our break will be over soon.
So it is just you and me again, huh?
Oh, so he started playing again?
Should I take a snack over to him, maybe?
Is it different than how you interpret the music?
How do you want to play this piece?
As long as she is quiet.
The only thing I am afraid of is injury.
The other day Arima-kun had smoke coming out of his ears.
I think it will actually be visible soon.
I think he might be pushing himself too hard.
I mean, he was kind of reeling in the hallway.
I do want him to play the piano.
But I do not want him to suffer.
Right now, Arima-kun is trying to turn that suffering into notes.
Exposing both his pain and his suffering, even his own struggling self...
That is how he will come to dwell inside his music.
That is how we play music that is alive.
Arima-kun is in the middle of doing that.
Why are you so supportive of Kousei, Kao-chan?
I guess I would have to say...
He is like a hopeless kid brother, maybe?
I am on my way home from practice now.
I was wondering what you were up to.
I am on my way home now, too.
We are always heading home at the same time these days, huh?
Why do not we... go out?
How do I want to play this piece of music, I wonder?
Who do I want to play it for?
Why do not you pack it in for today?
I have known that as well.
I realized it when I saw your room.
you try to abandon the piano...
Even as you cling to it for support.
That is why, as if you are turning your back on it,
you try to hide it under dust and books.
You love it, but you cannot go near it.
You miss it, but you cannot touch it.
Even though you are grieving, though you are hurting.
And I pretend that I do not see that.
Irresponsible things like that - that is all I say.
You are suffering because of me...
I am sorry... I am sorry...
It was you who swept away all that dust.
I look like I am suffering, huh?
But of course I would be suffering.
I mean, I am going to sail in uncharted waters, right?
Both taking on a challenge, and creating something, is painful.
My world had already changed long ago.
It is just that I never realized it.
For sweeping away the dust that had collected on my body...
Ever since that day, my world... even the keyboard...
The girl that my best friend likes.
As if we are hiding from the silver moon,
the two of us in this music room, in the middle of the night...
It is like there is no one in the world but us.
Uh, we will now begin the rally for Regionals.
Now then, let us hear how pumped up
What lucky boys you are to have been born in this era!
After all, you are going to be there when a star named Ryota Watari is born!
But I can see you have got the set piece down pat.
Even if I can play the sheet music perfectly, it does not change anything.
Where are you in all this?
Why do not we go cheer at Regionals?
I will only be the same as before if I leave it like this.
I am going to transcend perfection.
We are going to go cheer!
If you shut yourself up in here, you will suffocate.
Musicians need time to gaze up at the sky!
Tighten up the defense in the hole!
Do not let anything get through!
We are counting on you, Tsubaki.
If we do not at least tie it up...
By exchanging notes, you get to know one another,
Let us go, Triple Crown champ!
As if your souls were connected, and your hearts were overlapping.
It is a conversation through instruments.
In that moment, music transcends words.
Do not you think that is awful?
Making a girl carry him on her shoulders!
Well, but girls are bigger during childhood.
I am talking about a maiden's heart.
But even though he is normally hopeless,
he is amazing when he plays the piano.
I mean, the other day he got a standing ovation...
You are always going on and on about Arima-kun.
I do not like this, I do not like this, I do not like this.
That I have no right to be feeling this way.
But I still do not like it!
I just do not like it.
I was always by his side.
During times of joy, and of grief as well.
I realize he is faraway from me now...
I am not by his side...
Do not look at someone else!
Tsubaki, I am going home this way.
But you live over there, Kashiwagi.
But nobody else was onto me!
Yeah, and how long have we known each other?
She said, Go to Tsubaki-chan by yourself.
After that roll down the hill, you carried me like this, even though you were hurt.
And then your own ankle swelled up like a handball, too.
You have not changed at all since we were kids.
But I know everything about you.
So you never have to hold back with me, all right?
I have always made you worry so much about me,
so I wish you would let me worry about you once in a while.
I might be a flaky kid brother, but I am going to try hard.
I am going to try hard.
So... I want the happy Tsubaki to watch me.
Because it would be too lame to ride on your shoulders forever.
You are lighter than you look, huh, Tsubaki?
So you are a girl, after all!
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
You are right, that was a weird thing to say.
The seasons... might be about to change...
We have the long, long time that we have spent together,
and we have so many tiny, precious memories.
Next time, I will give you a piggyback ride, okay?
We freakin' lost because of me...
After we all fought so hard!
I am so bitter, I am so bitter!
Even though I am bitter over losing, even though I am depressed,
even though my ankle hurts, and my eyes are smeared with tears...
Even though I have never felt worse..
I wonder why the stars are sparkling like this.
The scent of the music room in his hair.
I can hear his slightly ragged breathing.
His shoulder, wet with tears, is so warm.
I wish time would just stand still.
This is the list of Maihou contestants.
It will get you fired up.
I have been waiting for two whole years.
Now it is time for me to get revenge for all those years of humiliation!
I have been wondering what you were up to, and now you have finally shown up.
Just you wait, I am going to wipe up the floor with you next time!
